extension.description: A repository for Israeli VOD content that connects to the following:[CR]1. Walla video - including everything the site has to offer Yes, Nicolodeon, Sport 5 and 1 and more. currently does not include MTV[CR]2. Nana10 - All the TV shows from channel 10{CR]3. Mako - MOst videos from Mako. Because mako blocks its new shows currently showing the old shows although listing the new shows to. Be aware that some of the streams from Mako may get XBMC stuck[CR]4. Live video streams of channel 10, 22[CR]5. Scraper for movies that connects to Torec[CR][CR]Please report issues on google code project http://ilVideo.googlecode.com/
